description.raw:
The X1 robot is not turning very well, but I think we can fix it by allowing some wheel slip in the lateral direction. This pull request fixes the friction direction (which is relative to the collision) so that it is parallel to the joint axis. It then adds a small amount of wheel slip in that same direction (parallel to the joint axis / lateral to the wheels) that allows some slip during skid-steer turning.

There is a drawback to this change if you are parked sideways on a slope, the robot will slowly slide down at a steady rate. A better fix would be to use the WheelSlipPlugin in the following gazebo pull request, but it is not merged or released yet:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2950/adding-wheelslipplugin-for-adding-wheel/diff
